name: A N O M I E

metadata.name: h o u s e b o u n d
metadata.description:
Are our changing living  patterns and social relations further isolating us from the society or are they moving us forward in supporting each other with the growing community consciousness?
Not only that, it is thought that in the developing digital world order, it isolate people and directs them to a home-bound life. So, does a home-bound life indicate that one is lonely? On the contrary, would it not further support the division of labor if individuals began to produce in small groups or alone? It can even be an opportunity to get people who do their job with devotion one step earlier.  The fact that people are free in their own working environment also increases the quality and originality of the work produced.As opposed to a home-bound life, it can be interpreted as a life that improves when you support each other under a community

“ h o u s e b o u n d ”, includes many people who come together to form a single person.
